metadata.title: CVE-2023-33250 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Linux kernel 6.3 has a use-after-free in iopt_unmap_iova_range indrivers/iommu/iommufd/io_pagetable.c.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
